ksdk:manifest.name: SDK version 2.4.0 package for MIMXRT1061xxxxA device
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.4.0 manifest file. It describes the content of the SDK version 2.4.0 package for MIMXRT1061xxxxA device and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.4.0

board.name: EVK-MIMXRT1060
board.description: MIMXRT1060-EVK: EVK Development Platform for i.MX MIMXRT1062 and MIMXRT1061 MCUs

specific.content: The NXP MIMXRT1060-EVK is a development board for the i.MX MIMXRT1062 and MIMXRT1061 600 MHz 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 MCUs

device.name: MIMXRT1061
device.description: MIMXRT1061: i.MX® MIMXRT1061 600MHz, 512KB SRAM Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-7 Core

specific.content: The MIMXRT1061 are ARM Cortex-M7 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

device.name: MIMXRT1062
device.description: MIMXRT1062: i.MX® MIMXRT1062 600MHz, 512KB SRAM Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-M7 Core

specific.content: The MIMXRT1062 are ARM Cortex-M7 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
